description: ANITA (SMILEY) PURI was born in Mumbai in 1955. After completing her education from the prestigious Lawrence School, Lovedale, Ooty, and Miranda House, Delhi, she pursued a diploma in Travel & Tourism. After that, she went on to work for Japan Airlines and Kuwait Airways. She married Aditya Puri in 1978, and has two children, Amit and Amrita. She has dabbled in business linked to her passion in fashion and antiques, and has a deep connection to the scriptures and spirituality. An accomplished artist, she has six solo exhibitions to her credit.
name: Anita "Smiley" Puri
